text: Then I saw an angel descending from heaven, holding in his hand the key to the abyss and a huge chain.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2902" class="">seized</st> the <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st>—the <st data-num="744" class="">ancient</st> <st data-num="3789" class="">serpent</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">tied</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">up</st> for a <st data-num="5507" class="">thousand</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>.

The angel then threw him into the abyss and locked and sealed it so that he could not deceive the nations until the one thousand years were finished. (After these things he must be released for a brief period of time.)

Then I saw thrones and seated on them were those who had been given authority to judge. I also saw the souls of those who had been beheaded because of the testimony about Jesus and because of the word of God. These had not worshiped the beast or his image and had refused to receive his mark on their forehead or hand. They came to life and reigned with Christ for a thousand years.

(The <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2198">come to life</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="5507" class="">thousand</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> were <st data-num="5055">finished</st>.)<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st>.

Blessed and holy is the one who takes part in the first resurrection. The second death has no power over them, but they will be priests of God and of Christ, and they will reign with him for a thousand years.
Now when the thousand years are finished, Satan will be released from his prison

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="1831">go out</st> to <st data-num="4105" class="">deceive</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="1137" class="">corners</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="1136" class="">Gog</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3098" class="">Magog</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4863" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">together</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">battle</st>. <st data-num="846" class="">They</st> are <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="706" class="">numerous</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="285">grains of sand</st> in <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>.<n id="3" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="305">went up</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4114">broad plain</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2944" class="">encircled</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="3925" class="">camp</st><n id="5" /> of the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="25" class="">beloved</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2597">came down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">devoured</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">completely</st>.<n id="7" />
And the devil who deceived them was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur, where the beast and the false prophet are too, and they will be tormented there day and night forever and ever.
Then I saw a large white throne and the one who was seated on it; the earth and the heaven fled from his presence, and no place was found for them.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, the <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3398" class="">small</st>, <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="975" class="">books</st> were <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="975" class="">book</st> was <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>—the book of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> were <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> what was <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">books</st>, <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>.<n id="4" />

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave up</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> that were <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">Death</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="86" class="">Hades</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave up</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> that were <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1538">each one</st> was <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2288" class="">Death</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="86" class="">Hades</st> were <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3041" class="">lake</st> of <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>. <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>—the <st data-num="3041" class="">lake</st> of <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>.
If anyone’s name was not found written in the book of life, that person was thrown into the lake of fire.
